short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Focus on experience, passion, goals, not looks. Removes profile pictures from your LinkedIn experience.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Nix Pics removes profile pictures from your LinkedIn experience, so you can focus on experience not looks. By doing this, Nix Pics helps eliminate any cognitive biases you may have, that comes from seeing someone's profile picture. By removing profile pictures from your LinkedIn experience, you can focus on what really matters.
